Title: Nintama Rantarou: Saraba Ninjutsu Gakuen no Dan
Description: ['Rantarou misunderstands an overheard comment from the Headmaster and leaves Ninjutsu Academy in shock. At the same time, the Dokutake Castle ninja team is once again up to no good...']
Characters: ['Settsuno, Kirimaru', 'Fukutomi, Shinbei', 'Inadera, Rantarou', 'Zenpouji, Isaku', 'Doi, Hansuke', 'Nakazaike, Chouji', 'Ohama, Kanemon', 'HemuHemu', 'Yamamura, Kisanta', 'Hachiya, Saburou']
